content: raglan sts 24 24 24 26 26 sts right sleeve 1 raglan sts 44 46 48 48 52 sts front 1 raglan sts 24 24 24 26 26 sts left sleeve 1 raglan sts 22 23 24 24 26 sts left back page 4 of 7 raglan increases on the yoke now continue in the round on the circular needle from the rs while working raglan increases on every other round as follows round 1 * knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch m1l * work from * to * a total of 4 times while working the stitches into lace pattern on the sleeves knit to end of round 8 sts have been increased round 2 knit across work rounds 1 and 2 20 23 24 25 27 times there are now a total of 300 328 340 352 376 sts on the needle distribution of sts 42 46 48 49 53 sts right back 1 raglan st 64 70 72 76 80 right sleeve 1 raglan sts 84 92 96 98 106 sts front 1 raglan st 64 70 72 76 80 sts left sleeve 1 raglan sts 42 46 48 49 53 sts left back the total number of sts for the sleeves has now been achieved so now increases are worked only on the body as follows round 1 * knit to marker m1r knit raglan stitch knit to marker knit raglan stitch m1l * work from * to * a total of 2 times while working the stitches into lace pattern on the sleeves knit to end of round 4 sts have been increased round 2 knit across work rounds 1 and 2 a total of 2 3 5 6 6 times there are now a total of 308 340 360 376 400 sts on the needles the yoke has now been completed distribution of sts 44 49 53 55 59 sts right back 1 raglan st 64 70 72 76 80 sts right sleeve 1 raglan st 88 98 106 110 118 sts front 1 raglan st 64 70 72 76 80 sts left sleeve 1 raglan st 44 49 53 55 59 sts left back the yoke/raglan line measures after the neckband approx 20 21 22 24 26 cm but it depends on the yarn/gauge you use page 5 of 7 body divide the stitches for body and sleeves while casting on new stitches at the underarms remove the raglan markers at the same time work as follows knit 44 49 53 55 59 sts k1 raglan st place the next 64 70 72 76 80 sts on a stitch holder right sleeve cast on 6 8 10 12 12 new sts for the underarm using the backward loop method k1 raglan st knit 88 98 106 110 118 sts front k1 raglan st place the next 64 70 72 76 80 sts on a stitch holder left sleeve cast on 6 8 10 12 12 new sts for the underarm using the
